snippet.title: Marvel Rivals: Get Ready for Fun! | Dev Vision Vol. 02
snippet.description:
Tune in to our Dev Vision Vol 2, as our Lead Combat Designer, Zhiyong, discusses Game Experience Optimization, New Maps and Anti-Cheat Measures.

We'll be releasing 4 new maps on top of the maps from our Closed Beta Test for Quick Match and Competitive Modes including the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda featuring Birnin T'Challa and the Hall of Djalia, Hydra Charteris Base: Hell's Heaven, Klyntar: Symbiotic Surface.

We are so appreciative of your support throughout this journey and we can't wait to Ignite the Battle with you on December 6th!

Wishlist Marvel Rivals now on:
Steam: https://t.co/IPhy0Of1cG
PlayStation: https://t.co/FR0aVfTmcn
Xbox: https://t.co/GaAYz7Nku6
Epic Games: https://t.co/QXoxz0VAP7

Follow #MarvelRivals for the latest news:
🔹 Discord:https://discord.gg/marvelrivals
🔹 Twitter:https://twitter.com/MarvelRivals
🔹 Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/marvelrivals/
🔹 Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/marvelrivals/
🔹 Tiktok:https://www.tiktok.com/@marvelrivals
🔹 Twitch:https://www.twitch.tv/marvelrivals

#MarvelRivals  #DevVision
